Amazing title for the Bookshelf

Want to keep track of the books you already read? Or the books that you are currently reading? Wait no more! Using this easy to use application you can do so in just a couple of steps! First, you click the New Book button, fill in the book information in the form, and click the green Add button, you will notice that the book gets added to the books' table at the top, and now you are tracking that book!
